creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: two standing bald men with long greying beards, holding hands; man in front is shirtless, with tattoos on his upper arms and PR chest, wearing jeans; man in back has silver nose ring, tattoo on his PR arm, and wears a purple tank top and black pants
signed: on back in black: Sky, 64, and Mike, 55, Palm Springs, CA, 2017  1/5  Jess T. Dugan  Jess Dugan
text: Dugan's intimate portraits capture the fragility and vulnerability of Queer and non-binary couples in America. The subjects of this work, Mike and Sky have been interviewed by the artist. “I think the greatest fear for me is the greatest fear for anybody who’s in a couple, that my partner will pass away,” Mike said. “I’m also worried about the lack of nursing homes and long-term care facilities geared toward our community.
title: Sky, 64, and Mike, 55, Palm Springs, Calif.
